name: Apple Cinnamon Sparkling Sangria
description: French apple cider and apple brandy are swirled together with cinnamon simple syrup and fresh crisp apples.
recipeIngredient: 1 750 ml bottle of cidre buché, or dry French sparkling apple cider, very cold
1 apple, any variety, cored and very thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, heat the water, sugar, and cinnamon sticks together over medium-high heat. As soon as the sugar is dissolved, shut off the heat, and let the syrup steep until it has come to room temperature.
When the syrup is cooled, add the cinnamon syrup, the cider, the Calvados, and the sliced apples to a jug. Stir, and serve immediately.
